LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerTheoryResearch.label: Theory of wireless power emission
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerTheoryResearch.descr: Allow you to unlock wireless power technologies
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerShortRangeResearch.d: Allows you to create stable local wireless power networks (LWPN) which allow to use connected electrical devices without electric wires
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerShortRangePortableRe: Allows you to build portable LWPN emitter, very practical on caravan and quest maps
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerLongRangeResearch.de: Allows you to create stable long range wireless power networks (WPN)
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerLongRangeAdvancedRes: Allows you to create advanced WPN emitter which consumes less energy and works properly even during a thunderstorm
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerLongRangePortableRec: Allows you to create portable WPN receiver which can be very practical during a caravan and quest maps
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerLongRangeARES.label: ARES
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerLongRangeARES.descri: Allow you to use the WPN receivers as a weapon by draining all the energy from the source electrical network and then channeling it as a very local intense thunderstorm
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerLongRangeARESEMP.des: A devious way to use the ARES system to generate big electromagnetic pulse ( EMP ) that will burn all electrical systems in the radius of impact
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerLongRangeARES2.label: ARES 2.0
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerLongRangeARES2.descr: An improvement to the ARES system that significantly widens the diameter and intensity of the storm
LanguageData.ARKPPP_HackingSatelliteNetwork.label: Hacking network of power-collection satellites
LanguageData.ARKPPP_HackingSatelliteNetwork.descripti: Allow you to unlock technologies related to satellite network power-collection
LanguageData.ARKPPP_HackingSatelliteNetworkSTS.label: Satelitte target system
LanguageData.ARKPPP_HackingSatelliteNetworkSTS.descri: Allow you to a satellite targetting system, which will guide to the nearest centimeter the orbital beam directly on an absorption dish
LanguageData.ARKPPP_HackingSatelliteNetworkAD.label: Absorption dish
LanguageData.ARKPPP_HackingSatelliteNetworkAD.descrip: Allow you to build giant absorption dish
LanguageData.ARKPPP_HackingSatelliteNetworkLens.label: Beam coloring lens
LanguageData.ARKPPP_HackingSatelliteNetworkLens.descr: Allow you to change the powerbeam's color
LanguageData.ARKPPP_HackingSatelliteNetworkADRT.label: Remote absorption dish
LanguageData.ARKPPP_HackingSatelliteNetworkADRT.descr: Allow you to build AD relay tower which let you link STS and AD remotely
